definition: Taibei or Taipei, capital of Taiwan
Taiwan (abbr.)
platform/stage/terrace/stand/support/station/broadcasting station/classifier for vehicles or machines
north/(classical) to be defeated
Taibei or Taipei, capital of Taiwan
Taipei county in north Taiwan (now renamed 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4])
Chinese Taipei, name for Taiwan to which the PRC and Taiwan agreed for the purpose of participation in international events
National Taipei University of Technology
pinyin: Guo2 li4 Tai2 bei3 Ke1 ji4 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: The headquarters of the organization is located in National Taipei University of Technology.
sentences.chinese: 本社社址位於臺北科技大學校區。

sentences.english: Mr Wei rushed to Taipei during his rest day on a Sunday to see Mr Zhang.
sentences.chinese: 魏姓同學便利用星期日趕到臺北和張先生見面。

sentences.english: In Taipei's movie district, the action flicks are always the biggest draws.
sentences.chinese: 臺北西門町的電影街中，動作片的觀衆總是最多。

sentences.english: This makes as little sense as transiting Penghu to fly from Taipei to Kaohsiung.
sentences.chinese: 豈不正如自臺北到高雄，命其須在澎湖中轉？

sentences.english: Taipei features abundant living requirements and convenient traffic routes.
sentences.chinese: 臺北擁有最便利的生活機能以及密集的交通網。

sentences.english: Zhao Xiaolan was born in 1953 in Taibei, the ancestral home Shanghai Jiading.
sentences.chinese: 趙小蘭於1953年出生在臺北，祖籍上海嘉定。

sentences.english: Is your friend taking the train to Taibei?
sentences.chinese: 你的朋友在乘火車去臺北嗎？

sentences.english: After he settled his life in Taipei, he sent for his parents to live together with him immediately.
sentences.chinese: 他在臺北立腳以後就馬上把他的父母接來一起生活了。

sentences.english: Drive to the north, and we'll get to Taipei soon.
sentences.chinese: 往北方開，我們很快能到臺北。

sentences.english: Operator, I'd like to call Taibei, please. Station-to-station.
sentences.chinese: 接線生，我要打到臺北的叫號電話。

sentences.english: Are there special places in Taipei for this kind of inspection?
sentences.chinese: 臺北有專門的體檢中心嗎？

sentences.english: I used to live in Taibei.
Mom as an artist, please stand up. I am waiting for your company to Taipei van Gogh exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 藝術家媽媽，請你要站起來，我等你來臺北看梵谷展。

sentences.english: Mr. Jones is away from Taipei.
Zhao Xiaolan was born in 1953 in Taibei, the ancestral home is Shanghai Jiading.
sentences.chinese: 趙小蘭於1953年出生在臺北，祖籍上海嘉定。

sentences.english: Hello, this is the Foreign Affairs Police.
sentences.chinese: 您好，這裏是臺北市警局外事處。
